attributes.action: find funding for the Metropolitan Line extension to Watford Junction, commonly refferred to locally as Croxley Link
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Metropolitan Line currently runs to Cassionbury Park on Watfords Outskirts. TfL has a costed plan to divert some / all services East from Croxley and onto the disused rail line to Watford High ST, dual tracking it and linking up West Watford. Given the need for Watford FC to expand and the towns growing population, it is an idea whose time has come.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "find funding for the Metropolitan Line extension to Watford Junction, commonly refferred to locally as Croxley Link."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13566.asp

Prime Minister's Office
